reviewText: Hard to understand as it is not in English and you hear the original and the English.  Have to really concentrate and have it quiet to understand.  The DVD case was damaged on arrival.  It is very good and instructing and repeating moves.

This DVD series is pretty good all around, for beginner or any other person with experience wanting to learn Krav Maga. They take you step by step through the learning process. For those who are great fans of this wonderful system of self defense will also appreciate and enjoy this production. Highly recommend it.
